aws_api_gateway_client_certificate.description: Provides an API Gateway Client Certificate.

description.description: The description of the client certificate.

id.description: The identifier of the client certificate.

created_date.description: The date when the client certificate was created.

expiration_date.description: The date when the client certificate will expire.

pem_encoded_certificate.description: The PEM-encoded public key of the client certificate.
